description: VirusPseAAC is a dataset from the area of bioinformatics.  It describes the task of predicting sub-cellular locations of proteins in organism according to their sequences. However, compared to GO datasets it represents the protein samples using pseudo amino acid composition including 20 amino-acid, 20 pseudo-amino acid and 400 dipeptide components. The labels are the subcellular locations where a protein may appear. These numbers are different depending on the organism at interest.
name: VirusPseAAC
